queasy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: feeling that you are going to vomit
queasy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The sea got rougher, and I began to feel queasy.
queasy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: feeling uncomfortable because an action seems morally wrong
queasy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Many Democrats felt queasy about the issue.
